mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.title, t.sell_point, t.price, t.num, t.image, c.id AS catid, c.name, c.parent_id, c.type_id, s.seller_id, s.name, s.nick_name, s.email, s.linkman_name, s.linkman_mobile FROM tb_item t LEFT JOIN tb_seller s ON t.seller_id=s.seller_id LEFT JOIN tb_item_cat c ON t.cat_id=c.id WHERE t.id=#{itemId};
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_item SET image=#{image} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_item_cat AS a,tb_item AS b WHERE a.id=b.categoryId AND b.categoryId IN (SELECT id FROM tb_item_cat WHERE parent_id IN (SELECT id FROM tb_item_cat WHERE parent_id=74)) ORDER BY b.create_time DESC LIMIT 1,6
